title: ChIP-seq data analysis

workflows.name: GTN - ChIP Seq - Formation Of Super Structures On Xi
workflows.title: GTN - ChIP Seq - Formation Of Super Structures On Xi

history.message: Add licence and update author ids
Update ChIP-Seq tutorial with latest tool versions and links
Move chip-seq tutorials to epigenetics topic

admin_install_yaml:
---
install_tool_dependencies: true
install_repository_dependencies: true
install_resolver_dependencies: true
tools:
- name: deeptools_bam_compare
  owner: bgruening
  revisions: de72ba3ed6f2
  tool_panel_section_label: deepTools
  tool_shed_url: https://toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/
- name: deeptools_bam_coverage
  owner: bgruening
  revisions: 12af64f93288
  tool_panel_section_label: deepTools
  tool_shed_url: https://toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/
- name: deeptools_compute_matrix
  owner: bgruening
  revisions: 9470f29702f8

- name: deeptools_multi_bam_summary

- name: deeptools_plot_correlation
